context: Analyze this foundational balancing pose and its relationships within standing sequences. Tree Pose (Vrksasana) develops balance, focus, and single-leg strength while creating a sense of rootedness and growth. Consider the standing leg engagement, hip opening of the bent leg, and various arm positions. Analyze progressions from wall support to advanced variations and its role in building concentration and stability.
